general.headline: Managing Director, DXC Technology,  Australia and New Zealand
general.description:
Seelan is Managing Director, DXC Technology ANZ, created by the merger of CSC and HPE Enterprise Services. Seelan has a razor sharp focus on delivering increased shareholder value and helping clients harness the power of innovation to thrive on change. In his role, Seelan has been instrumental in making strategic investments and securing key partnerships that have enabled DXC to successfully lead clients on their digital transformation journey. 

He is focused on helping clients drive greater agility and innovation. Seelan believes that people are a strategic differentiator and is committed to developing next-generation skills throughout the organisation.

He has a solid track record of revitalising complex business units of multinational organisations and played a pivotal role in the recent acquisitions of both UXC and Xchanging. 

Prior to DXC, Seelan held several senior executive positions with IBM. He joined IBM Australia in 1999, and worked across different regions and countries, including Australia, Asia Pacific, the Middle East & Africa, Central and Eastern Europe, and South America.

general.headline: Head of Robotics hub (Europe) / Global Head of RPA operations Center
general.description:
I am inspired most when providing leadership and taking ownership of key projects. I have a genuine passion for people management and achieving and retaining high standards, I continuously strive to understand the bigger business picture and utilise excellent communication skills to solve business issues. 

I have acquired a reputation for quickly grasping new ideas and concepts. Effectively combining outstanding people skills with commercial acumen to develop innovative and creative solutions to problems. I see myself as a highly driven individual who exceeds set goals without compromising levels of service. 

I greatly enjoy working on my own initiative as well as part of a successful team and demonstrate the high levels of motivation required to meet the tightest of deadlines. Even under significant pressure, I possess a strong ability to perform effectively.

The type of role which really excites me is one where there is potential for personal and professional growth and where creativity and attention to detail are second nature. I wish to utilise my huge success and wealth of transferrable skills to develop my career further.

I love doing what I have a passion for such as providing excellent leadership and outstanding technical, management and customer service provision. I relish new and refreshing challenges which give me great satisfaction when I resolve the issue. 

I ensure exceptional attention to detail in everything that I do and I always demand excellence from myself. I would love to see what opportunities I can bring you. Please email me on  goldovitch@gmail.com and I will call you back

contact details and I will call you back.

general.headline: Robotic Process Automation (RPA) / Intelligent Automation
general.description:
Talent and Advisory for Digital Innovation and Transformation
 
At Edge Tech we focus purely on the provision of talent and digital advisory services into businesses looking to digitalise their offerings, remove the legacy systems roadblock, and embark on projects around Smart and Connected Technologies.
 
We are partnered with household name brands and some of the biggest names in the RPA, Intelligent Automation, AI, Data, Blockchain and the Internet of Things markets. We have successfully placed across a variety of technologies including all of the above for positions including; Senior Exec Search Appointments, CXO suite, Programme/Project Managers, Product Specialist/Managers, Senior and Junior Sales, Developers, Architects, Business Analysts, and Consultants.

We have a NED network made up of industry experts and Interim leaders; people who have been there and done that with some of the most recognised names in the Digital industries, allowing us to provide high-level interim consulting services to supplement our expertise in highly successful permanent and contract recruitment campaigns
 
Robotic Process Automation, RPA, Blue Prism, Automation Anywhere, UiPath, Workfusion, Kryon Systems, Antworks, Pega, Kofax Kapow, Intelligent Automation, AI, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, Big Data, ML, Machine Learning, Machine Intelligence, Internet of Things, M2M, Industrial IoT, Low Power, Wireless Energy Harvesting, Automation, Smart Wearable, Smart Home, Connected Home, Smart City, Smart Environments, Smart Enterprise, IoT Software Environments, Device Cloud Infrastructure, IoT Security, IoT Data Analytics, IoT Storage, Securing the IoT

 +44 (0) 7505 141 065  
+44 (0) 1908 382 398

harrison.goode@edgetechheadhunters.io

www.edgetechheadhunters.io

jobs.description:
Edge Tech is a leading disruptive headhunting business with a wealth of expertise covering emerging technologies including RPA (Robotic Process Automation), IoT (Internet of Things), AI (Artificial Intelligence), Data Science, Machine Learning and Blockchain.

With rapid growth in disruptive technologies sectors, well-qualified talent is very hard to find. Also finding the right recruitment business with genuine disruptive technology experience is a minefield, with so called sector experts trying to capitalise on rapidly growing and evolving sector. The Board of Directors at Edge Tech have 10 years of genuine market experience recruiting the best talent within emerging technologies including RPA (Robotic Process Automation), IoT (Internet of Things), AI (Artificial Intelligence), Data Science/Machine Learning and Blockchain.

Get in touch for more information:

M: 07505 141 065

Manchester: 0161 327 0713
London : 020 3633 6203

I successfully built RPA, IA & AI teams for technology vendors, consultancies, SI’s, Banks, Insurance companies, Retail and FMCG across the globe. My network spans all the major RPA technologies – UiPath, Blue Prism, Automation Anywhere, Thoughtonomy, WorkFusion, NICE, Autologyx, Kofax Kapow and Pega/Openspan, from high level interim and permanent practice leaders, to technical sales, sales, solution architects and certified developers.

jobs.jobTitle: Assistant Vice President, robotic Process Automation
jobs.description:
Solution delivery and client facing leadership delivering RPA and lean digital solutions
      to improve insurance business processes. Collaborate with client and automation
      delivery centers to develop digital transformation road maps by leveraging emerging
      
      technologies, design thinking, lean principles, and domain knowledge.

Collaborate with executive and senior level stakeholders to deliver global Point of Sell (POS) solutions and Omni-channel customer experience. Accountable to executive sponsors for schedule, budget, and delivery quality for all program elements. Engage with product managers to ensure deliverables meet stakeholder expectations and contract commitments.

Business unit leader delivering Web based decision tools and dashboard solutions for
      USAF executive level leadership. Responsible for business unit revenue growth and
      P&L. Collaborate with senior leadership to develop vision and strategy road map to
      
      change organization capabilities and behavior by using disruptive technologies.

Establish the program management office (PMO) to meet P&L goals and deliver software consulting services for clients. Gestalt grew from 20 to 400 people achieving 60M in annual revenue. Lead multiple distributed software development teams delivering Web services solutions supporting collaboration and information transparency at the executive level.

Lead multiple software development teams delivering eCommerce and DoD ESB solutions, manage budgets, develop client relationships, and business development. Software development teams rapidly deliver systems during .COM rush to stand up eCommerce infrastructure. Conduct business and IT capability assessments for third party investors or clients making strategic investment decisions. Deliver B2B eCommerce exchange to modernize the procurement process resulting in cost savings. Lead architect for the Intelligent Mission Controller Node (IMCN) project using artificial intelligence (AI) to reduce model controller personnel. Instrumental in developing the ByeBye Now customer relationship management (CRM) travel reservation system. Open the Orlando, FL office to include managing facilities, hiring the staff and managing the day-to-day operations.

Lead software development teams and product management for the TACSIM simulation system used in training DoD Intelligence staffs. Design and develop the system for managing message traffic between the high and low side DoD security networks, replacing antiquated technology and reduce costs. Design Lead to replace the TACSIM simulation using Service Oriented Architecture (SOA) technology enabling scalability and reduce system costs for operations. Evangelist for using Open Source Software (OSS) technologies and developed the largest distributed simulator based on Java and SOA. Responsible for hiring recommendations, mentoring software developers, and manage the day-to-day software development operations.

Senior software engineer leading the Graphical Input Aggregate Control (GIAC) project delivering interoperability for simulations training Joint Battle Staffs. The project involved distributed servers, messaging middle ware and user experience technologies allowing exercise controllers to seamlessly interact with multiple simulators. The GIAC geographical display reduces exercise staff, consolidates terminals and improves training realism.

RPA  solution enables customer-facing and back-office users to complete tasks quickly and efficiently for increased productivity and effectiveness. Automating manual desktop processes and simplifying user interfaces also improves the customer experience because agents can focus on better serving customers when they are not distracted with the complexity of the technology they use.
